title: Transforming Scores
question_text:
A set of scores is transformed by applying the following to each of the scores:
$$\text{transformed score }= 2.6 \text{ (original score) }- 1.4$$
Which of the following statements is FALSE?

choices.text: The standard deviation of the transformed scores $= 2.6\text{ (standard deviation of the original scores)} - 1.4$
The IQR of the transformed scores $= 2.6 \text{ (IQR of the original scores)}$
The Q3 of the transformed scores $=2.6 \text{ (Q3 original score)} - 1.4$
The mean of the transformed scores $= 2.6 \text{ (mean of the original score) }- 1.4$
The median of the transformed scores $= 2.6 \text{ (median of the original score) }- 1.4$
